author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: نِ هَلُمُّوا وَتَعَالَوْا يَا مَلأَ الأَعْلَى بِالأَرْوَاحِ وَالْقُلُوبِ، قُلْ هَذَا مَطْلِعُ الْغَيْبِ الْمَكْنُونِ لَوْ أَنْتُمْ مِنَ الْعَ
translation: Say: He it is Who is the Manifestation of Him Who is the Unknowable, the Invisible of the Invisibles, could ye but perceive it. He it is Who hath laid bare before you the hidden and treasured Gem, were ye to seek it. He it is Who is the one Beloved of all things, whether of the past or of the future. Would that ye might set your hearts and hopes upon Him!
